header.title: The best fence installation company in Santa Clara
bullets: FREE custom 3D fence quotes that you can design, review and edit online!
Responsive, quick and friendly customer service from end-to-end!
Transparent pricing and our quality assurance.
Beautiful, high-quality fences for your property built by skilled local craftsmen.

Yelp.description: Great company great business dealings. This company was very professional, personable, prompt and great communication. Replaced a common fence, 81 linear feet. Arrived during scheduled time and was done in a little over a half day. Installers were friendly and took pride in their work. Great finishing work. Would recommend.
Yelp.name: Sonny D.
Yelp.title: This company was very professional, personable, prompt and great communication.

Google.description: Andrea was an absolute gem to deal with in planning my communal fence with my neighbor. She was so nice and helpful. I must have asked a million questions and there was a lot of back and forth emails but every communication I had with her was nothing but professional, patient, and informative. She helped me immensely in planning and coordinating a new fence build of which I had no prior knowledge or experience with. After our dealings I’m actually pretty educated on wood fencing! Thanks Andrea!
Google.name: Thien H.
Google.title: Aan absolute gem to deal with in planning my communal fence with my neighbor

articles.description: If you’re looking to get a new fence in California, it’s important to know about the laws surrounding fences and home improvement projects. Our post will go over some important things to keep in mind.

When it’s time to get a new fence it’s important to always use a reputable, licensed, and insured contractor. Some people try to cut costs by using unlicensed contractors, but this can end up being a major issue if any problems happen during the installation or down the line. In this post, we’ll go over the main reasons why you should always use a licensed and insured fence contractor.

There’s a lot to consider when weighing the pros and cons of a wood fence versus a chain link fence. We’ve tried to make the process easier for you by diving deeper into some of the areas of consideration.
